option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
print the data values of the array variables.
filename of the Dat file, if this is omitted the document will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Dump the contents of a Dat file.

description.p: Dump the contents of a Dat file.
The contents of the Dat file are written as plain ASCII to standard output.

example.description: Dump the file "inp.dat", paginating using the more command.
